about_the_game:
"Frog King: Survive Bosses and Claim the Crown at the Top!" Undertake on a daring adventure through diverse environments, facing off against multiple challenging bosses. Dodge their relentless pursuit, collect power-ups to aid your ascent, and learn valuable lessons from every stumble..

Jump King was originally made for the Ludwig GameJam - where it won!

Gameplay:

-Prepare for high-stakes platforming!
The world holds many great foes and the only way past them is going up, Tension rises with each world as any mistake could lead to a great fall.

-Several movement abilities!
You'll find many power ups that greatly change the way you platform in Frog King!

  • The higher you get, the harder you fall
  • Customizable character
  • Challenging and unique bosses
  • Unique quests
  • Cosmetics

Atmosphere:

Learn to love and hate the unique bosses you meet on your journey to the top.

  • Pixel graphics mixed with scenic lighting
  • Several unique worlds
  • Incredible OST by raptori & duccw
  • High-defenition ambiences

The last hour led to this jump, everything is on the line! Will you conquer the worlds? Will you defeat the bosses? Do you have what it takes!?

name: Frog King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or similar
  • Additional Notes: If you have any kind of dedicated desktop GPU you should be fine.

short_description: Dive into Frog King, where survival is key and every leap counts! Face several relentless bosses and ascend to the throne in a world brimming with danger. Miss a jump and plummet into peril; conquer the odds and claim your crown. Will you hop to victory or fall to the depths in your quest to the top
